sense.gloss: to put clothes on (someone), to dress, to clothe
to cover, to coat, to plate, to gild, to veneer
to pin (e.g. a crime on someone), to lay (blame), to charge (with an offence), to give (a bad name), to remind someone of (their indebtedness)

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓が↑自分↑↓じぶん↓のペットに↑服↑↓ふく↓を|↑着↑↓き↓せる|ように、↑子猫↑↓こねこ↓に↑服↑↓ふく↓を↑着↑↓き↓せました。
sdata.e: She dressed him like children dress their pets.
